net.hudup.core.data.ctx

Interface ContextTemplate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HierContextTemplate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextTemplateImpl

    public interface ContextTemplate
extends java.io.Serializable
    The interface ContextTemplate represents a context template. ContextTemplate is template for a context represented by the class Context. Context includes time, location, companion, etc. associated with a user when she/he is buying, studying, etc. For example, Time is the template for time context 31/10/2015 6:45. In other words, context is an instance of context template with specific value. A set of context templates is structured as the model which is called context template schema represented by interface ContextTemplateSchema. Please see Context and ContextTemplateSchema for more details of context and context template schema.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

      • getProfileAttributes

        AttributeList getProfileAttributes()
        Each template has associated profile named "TemplateUnitName_TemplateId_Profile". In Hudup framework, this name has the form "hdp_context_template_$templateid_profile". For example, if the ID of this template is 1, its profile name is "hdp_context_template_1_profile". This methods returns the attribute list of such profile. The attribute list is represented by AttributeList.
        Returns:
        Attribute list of such profile associated with the profile of this template.

      • setProfileAttributes

        void setProfileAttributes(AttributeList profileAttributes)
        Each template has associated profile named "TemplateUnitName_TemplateId_Profile". In Hudup framework, this name has the form "hdp_context_template_$templateid_profile". For example, if the ID of this template is 1, its profile name is "hdp_context_template_1_profile". This method establishes a specified attribute list to such profile. The attribute list is represented by AttributeList.
        Parameters:
        profileAttributes - Specified attribute list.

      • hasProfile

        boolean hasProfile()
        Each template has associated profile named "TemplateUnitName_TemplateId_Profile". In Hudup framework, this name has the form "hdp_context_template_$templateid_profile". For example, if the ID of this template is 1, its profile name is "hdp_context_template_1_profile". This method checks whether this template has a profile.
        Returns:
        whether this template has a profile.

      • canInferFrom

        boolean canInferFrom(ContextTemplate template)
        This method indicates whether or not this template can be inferred from the other template specified by the input parameter. There are two cases of possibility of inference:
        1. Two templates are totally equal.
        2. This template can be inferred from specified template, it means that this template is more generic than specified template.

        For example, this template "Year/Month" can be inferred from the other template "Year/Month/Day".
        Parameters:
        template - the other context template.
        Returns:
        whether this template can be inferred from specified template

      • canInferTo

        boolean canInferTo(ContextTemplate template)
        Opposite to canInferFrom(ContextTemplate), which means that whether the other template can be inferred from this template.
        Parameters:
        template - The other context template.
        Returns:
        whether specified template can be inferred from this template
